      • read

        public int read(byte[] data,
                int offset,
                int len)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Read date from receive data buffer
        Parameters:
        data - data array[OUT]
        offset - data offset[IN]
        len - data length[IN]
        Returns:
        read length, >0 data length, 0:none
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiUART error occurs
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If data == null
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If array index out of range

      • setMode

        public void setMode(int baudRate,
                    int dataBits,
                    int stopBits,
                    int parity)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Set mode values, have platform dependencies
        Parameters:
        baudRate - baud rate[IN] baudRate:1200, 1200bps baudRate:2400, 2400bps baudRate:4800, 4800bps baudRate:9600, 9600bps, default baudRate:19200, 19200bps baudRate:38400, 38400bps baudRate:57600, 57600bps baudRate:..., ...
        dataBits - data bits number[IN] dataBits:5, 5bits dataBits:6, 6bits dataBits:7, 7bits dataBits:8, 8bits, default
        stopBits - stop bits[IN] stopBits:1, 1bit, default stopBits:2, 2bits
        parity - parity type[IN] 1.MODE_PARITY_NONE, default 2.MODE_PARITY_ODD 3.MODE_PARITY_EVEN
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiUART error occurs
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If baudRate or dataBits or stopBits value out of range

      • write

        public int write(byte[] data,
                 int offset,
                 int len)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Write date to send data buffer
        Parameters:
        data - data array[IN]
        offset - data offset[IN]
        len - data length[IN]
        Returns:
        write length
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiUART error occurs
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If data == null
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If array index out of range
